On 19 Apr 2007, at 09:29, Alan Dean wrote:

> Are you talking about changes to the message format, or changes
> required to the URI (unrelated to content-type)?

Interesting, versioning of the resource.. Could one use DeltaV (RFC  
3253) for that purpose, or is it too complex to twiddle down the  
WebDAV way?

It seems DeltaV adds versions as a separate resource, that could be a  
good inspiration.


Say using a wiki as an example, it would be interesting to do at least:

Which versions of resource R exists? When where they made, by whom?  
Give me version V of R.


Additional versioning meta-data could be a commit message, or view a  
'patch' or 'diff' - what was changed.

--
